```{r setup}
library(lmfa)
```

```{r setup}

set.seed(1000)
modelselection <- step1(
  data = ESM[sample(1:nrow(ESM), 1e3), ],
  indicators = c(
    "Interested",
    "Joyful",
    "Nervous",
    "Listless"
  ),
  n_state = 3,
  n_fact = c(3, 3, 2),
  modelselection = FALSE,
  n_state_range = NULL,
  n_fact_range = NULL,
  n_starts = 1,
  n_initial_ite = 2,
  n_m_step = 5,
  em_tolerance = 1e-8,
  m_step_tolerance = 1e-3,
  max_iterations = 5,
  n_mclust = 2
)

summary(modelselection)

```
